techmeme.title: Partior, a blockchain-based interbank payment network backed by JPMorgan, DBS, and Standard Chartered, raised a $60M Series B led by Peak XV Partners (Jamie Crawley/CoinDesk)
Sources: some of OpenAI's safety team felt pressured to speed through a safety protocol to meet GPT-4o's launch; Open AI says it "didn't cut corners" on safety (Washington Post)
In a June report, India's antitrust body CCI found that Apple exploited its dominant position in iOS Apps Store and engaged "in abusive conduct and practices" (Aditya Kalra/Reuters)
Apple launches Vision Pro in the UK, Canada, France, Germany, and Australia after launching in China, Hong Kong, Japan, and Singapore on June 28 (Tim Hardwick/MacRumors)
AT&T says it will begin notifying consumers about a data breach that allowed cybercriminals to steal phone records of "nearly all" of its customers (Zack Whittaker/TechCrunch)
